name: Jack Dragon and the Stone of Peace
name_original: Jack Dragon and the Stone of Peace
description:
The Stone of Peace, smashed to bits,
By Lord Moneybags, who got up and split.

Moneybags gains, and everyone suffers,
Everyone fighting, sisters and brothers.

Jack the Dragon,
He's just volunteered.
He'll find all the shards,
That have disappeared.

Collect all the gems,
To keep things on track.
Restore the peace stone,
To bring peace back.

Gameplay:
Collect all of the gem pieces to progress to the next level. Avoid touching the nasties. Collect the snowflake power up to freeze enemies in place (you are an ice dragon, after all!).



Controls:
Gameplay is similar to the arcade game classic 'Bomb Jack'. Tap the jump key to fly, then when you are in the air you can tap the jump key multiple times to glide.

Keyboard:
  • SPACE - Jump / Glide (TAP this key to glide)
  • Left arrow - Left
  • Right arrow - Right
  • ESC - Pause menu

XBox Controller:
  • Left stick - Move
  • A - Jump / Glide (TAP this key to glide/hover)
  • Start - Pause menu

Game features:
  • 72 time-limited single-screen levels
  • Bonus stages!
  • A boss battle against Lord Moneybags!
  • Music
  • Local leaderboard.
  • A psychedelic gem tunnel effect at the end of every level!
